sections.text:
54-196.Rules and regulations.

The Nebraska Brand Committee may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the Livestock Brand Act and section 54-415.

SourceLaws 1999, LB 778, ยง 27.

Annotations

Delegation of power to make rules and regulations was essential to complete exercise of powers conferred. Satterfield v. State, 172 Neb. 275, 109 N.W.2d 415 (1961).
